title: What champ can carry 1v9?
body: I need a champ that can carry 1v9 cause in gold, my four bronze 5 teammates are always with the enemy team so I have to vs them as well. Any suggestions?

replies.body: IF you were the best viktor au, viktor could easily carry 1v9 until at least diamond.
have you tried git gud

someone who can 1v5 enemy team and take fast towers.
you gonna need huge aoe or just burst damage.


Since you're dealing with bronze enemies,{{champion:23}} seems like it
Or try {{champion:11}}

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4QKWE2np,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-05T12:04:57.284+0000)
>
> Or try {{champion:11}}

yi not tanky enough

Q = Invulnerability.

Still got that lifestyle and crazy burst.

So tankyness isn't necessary.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4QKWE2np,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T04:59:20.549+0000)
>
> Q = Invulnerability.
> 
> Still got that lifestyle and crazy burst.
> 
> So tankyness isn't necessary.

so you either want to take skill and dodge sh.it with q

or press r and survive for like 5 secs?

both have lifesteal and crazy burst. 

cc still fu.cks them both up

Thing is Yi can dodge any non instant cc. If you're good, you can carry anything with yi.

[cowsep](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIA5b2LoGpY)

> [{quoted}](name=Doin Rocks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4QKWE2np,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T13:36:44.895+0000)
>
> Thing is Yi can dodge any non instant cc. If you're good, you can carry anything with yi.
> 
> [cowsep](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIA5b2LoGpY)

I know who cowsep is.


Do you think op can play yi as well as cowsep?

Obviously not. No one can. He is the Yi god for a reason. But it's never too late to start learning Yi, especially when people put him down as an "easy champion", he's one of the top high risk high reward champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Doin Rocks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4QKWE2np,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-13T02:48:20.707+0000)
>
> Obviously not. No one can. He is the Yi god for a reason. But it's never too late to start learning Yi, especially when people put him down as an "easy champion", he's one of the top high risk high reward champions.

Yea, i hate it when people say yi is ''click to win''

He may have one of the easiest skill floor
but has one of hte highest skill cap

Indeed. I hope you don't get too much flame for your username btw rofl, but sick b8 m8. Definitely one of the most straightforward champs in the game, yet has the biggest skill spike as soon as it rises away from low elo.
If you're in gold and are getting matched with bronzies, you deserve to be in bronze mate.
Cass, Annie, Zed (if you're mechanically sound with him), Vayne, Irelia. In that order.
Shaco can carry 2v9 xdeeee

But as far as enemy warding, how fed the enemy team is, how hard your team is making themselves to be carried, and how inferior Shaco's pushing is to most junglers, your spidey-sense and map tracking skills go, there is very little squeeze room to get carried by a jungler so easy to jump on and burst, so easy to tell who the clone is, so easy to single out if he pushes. The only thing he has going for him is counterjungling and he's hard to track, especially at low elo, and still somewhat at high elo. (not warding the right spots, not using pink wards etc).
Obviously not viktor. I suggest you try jayce?
Well if you watched Phreak's Lee Sin {{champion:64}}  spotlight you would know :^)
No my teammates are bronze 5 the enemies are gold 4.
{{champion:27}} If you say they are Bronze 5, just get near them and run around till they all drop dead.
